Text: Thnx bogart55, these are fantastic CDs, Hewitt and the Australian Chamber Orchestra do a great job. This is Bach at its best
Fuck Yeah! Bach is the nuts!!
I am dowloading today and I am going to seed until 500% or 4 weeks.
Listening to the freshly downloaded material I must tell you: Thank you, bogart55, thank you very much.

Thanks for sharing this. I do appreciate it but I'd appreciate it a lot more if all the file names weren't cut off.
If the ripper hadn't wasted space putting "J.S. Bach" and seven character code numbers and a second superfluous track number, like so "BWV1055 - 01 " , in every track's title perhaps there would have been room for each track's actual title. Also the albums are called "Bach - The Keyboard Concertos" Vol 1 and 2 respectively.

Oops. I forgot to mention it sounds fantastic. This is an excellent torrent. A truly wonderful performance. Check the Amazon reviews at the links above.
